Per a report from Bild+ (as captured by spox), veteran center-back Jérôme Boatengs contractual situation was a subject of intense debate at the Bayern Munich front office.

articles.author: Chris Bumbaca
articles.title: Dallas Mavericks owner Mark Cuban calls NBA playoffs play-in tournament 'enormous mistake' - USA TODAY
articles.description: Dallas Mavericks owner Mark Cuban says the NBA's idea of a play-in tournament while playing a compressed schedule was "an enormous mistake."
